casebody.data:
Ronald SCHIAVO
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 15, 2017

Sarah F. Summons, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Timothy F. Costello, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Ronald Schiavo's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 901, 151 A.3d 895 (2017), is denied.
